snippet: Scotland Yard formally acknowledged on Tuesday that it had acted unlawfully in 2006 and 2007 in failing to notify hundreds of individuals targeted by The News of the World.
abstract: Scotland Yard formally acknowledges that it acted unlawfully in 2006 and 2007 in failing to notify hundreds of individuals targeted by The News of the World as it hacked into the cellphone voice mail messages of politicians, sports stars and other celebrities.
lead_paragraph: Scotland Yard formally acknowledged on Tuesday that it had acted unlawfully in 2006 and 2007 in failing to notify hundreds of individuals targeted by The News of the World.

headline.main: Britain: Officials Acknowledge Failures on Phone Hacking
headline.print_headline: Britain: Officials Acknowledge Failures on Phone Hacking

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
